newsitem.title: LEBANON: Solidere shares mixed in Beirut.
newsitem.headline: Solidere shares mixed in Beirut.

text.p: Solidere shares were mixed on Friday on the Beirut Stock Exchange (BSE).
A shares fell to $113.375 from Thursday's $113.625 and B shares held steady at $117. Turnover was 11,404 shares from 11,408 and value was $942,501 from $1,310,817.625 a day earlier.
There was no trade in the four other companies listed on BSE: Ciments Libanais, Ciments Blancs, Eternit, and Uniceramic.
The LISPI stock index fell 0.03 percent to 83.45 and the BLOM stock index fell 0.08 percent to 971.74.
